articles.author: Reuters
articles.title: First pill for dengue shows promise in human challenge trial - CNBCTV18
articles.description: There are currently no specific treatments for dengue, a growing disease threat, the company said ahead of presentation of the data at the American Society of Tropical Medicine and Hygiene Annual Meeting in Chicago.

articles.author: Debby Wu, Peter Elstrom
articles.title: US Official Says Export Curbs Will Impede China's Chip Progress - Bloomberg
articles.description: The US-led restrictions over advanced chipmaking equipment for Chinese firms will ultimately deter China’s efforts to develop an indigenous semiconductor industry, according to a senior American official responsible for enforcing export controls.

articles.title: A tropical parasite, passed through the bite of a sand fly, is causing skin infections in the US - CNN
